assets.extended_description: Litecoin (LTC) is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency created in 2011 by Charlie Lee as a lighter alternative to Bitcoin. It features faster block generation times and a different hashing algorithm (Scrypt), allowing for quicker transaction processing and lower fees. Often referred to as the "silver to Bitcoin's gold," Litecoin is designed to provide a more efficient and accessible digital payment option.
assets.name: Litecoin
